Reviews.Title: “Avoid this hotel & its sister hotels close by”
Reviews.Author: James G
Reviews.Content: booked available rude manager nearby guest house shepherds bush road dirty bathroom mouldy carpets stained guest houses company owned look road manager shocked manager refused refund unhelpful lucky nearby majesty hotel instead complete joy clean service fantastic owner helpful similar price didnt hotel earlier search engine

Reviews.Content: tiny double single bed move bathroom smelt terrible carpet dirty stained paint splashes walls stained looked tea dirt grime rodent traps placed building taking building door noisy dusty rubbish tip outside headboards beds bedside cabinets lamps itching possibly flees person charge help refused offer refund paid front booked leaving hotel refund paid twice please warned
